name: Beware Nightfall
description:
Beware Nightfall is a 3D singel player indie horror game.

Until you've fixed the generator, try and survive the night.

When the lights turn off the monster hunts, beware! Turn valves, flip switches and close doors to make sure you survive. If you don't your fate will be much worse then just death..

Instructions
  • Use WASD to walk around 
  • Use shift to sprint
  • Use E to interact with objects throughout the map or to skip videos
  • Use space to close door
